revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=WatchGuard |model=Firebox Edge X20e-W |revision=(XP2E6W) |asin=B000RMGTCE;UK; |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=SerComm |manuf_model=WG50022 |manuf_rev=-1 |availability=EoL |est_release_date= |fcc_date=01/06/2006 |fcc_id=Q6G-XP2E6W |ic_id=4657A-XP2E6W |pcb_id=4900T400D |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.25 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Intel XScale |cpu1_model=IXP422B;PRIXP422BB; |cpu1_cspeed=266 |fla1=64 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9F1208U0B-PCB0 |fla2=1 |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=MX29LV800CTTC-70G |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Mira |ram1_model=P2V56S40BTP |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=1 |jtag=yes |serial=yes,, console,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2414A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Altima |eth_chip2_model=AC101L |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6060 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=2 |flags= |tp_firmware=DD-WRT |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.111.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:90:7F |oui_eth=00:90:7F }} {{TagLine|WatchGuard Firebox Edge e-Series (X20e/X20e-W)}} :[http://www.watchguard.com/products/edge-e/compare.asp?p1=x55e&p2=x20e&p3=x10e Product page]
"4900T400D" is silkscreened on the main board. :Has a 6th 10/100 BaseT Port labeled OPT.
Sample SSID patterns shown in the manual(s) are '''TRUSTED_XXXXX''' :and '''WIRELESS_XXXXX''' (both with lower case hex digits). The main OUI used may be 00:90:7F (''WatchGuard Technologies'')
The wireless module is a [http://web.archive.org/web/20050226020546/http://www.video54.com/ Video54] (now ''[[Ruckus Wireless]]'') branded module.
*[http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Watchguard_Firebox_Edge ''WatchGuard Firebox Edge'' on the '''DD-WRT''' wiki]
===Models=== :;[https://www.watchguard.com/products/edge-e/compare.asp?p1=x10e&p2=x20e&p3=x55e Compare models] *[[WatchGuard Firebox Edge X10e-W]] *[[WatchGuard Firebox Edge X20e-W]] *[[WatchGuard Firebox Edge X55e-W]] ([https://infodepot.fandom.com/wiki/Watchguard_Firebox_Edge_x55e Spec.]) <!-- CPU: Intel XScale PRIXP422BB Flash: MX29LV800CTTC-70G (1MB) Flash2: Samsung K9F1208U0B (64MB) RAM: 2x Mira P2V56S40BTP (64MB) Switch: Marvell 88E6060-RCJ1 WAN1: Altima AC101LKQTQ Eth Port: 2x 10/100 WAN, 4x 10/100 LAN Serial: Intersil (Renesas) ICL3243ECAZ :(RS-232 Line Drivers and Receivers) MiniPCI slots: 1 (802.11bg PCI Card) -->
===See also=== :;[http://watchguard.com.ru/products/ WatchGuard Products] *[[WatchGuard Firebox T35-W (MS3AE5W)]] (T15-W) *[[WatchGuard Firebox T55-W (MS5AE5W)]] *[[WatchGuard Firebox SOHO 6 (BF4S16E5W)]] *[[WatchGuard Firebox XTM 33-W (FS2E5W)]] ([[WatchGuard FS2E5W]]) :''WatchGuard Firebox XTM 3 Series FS2E5W (WG033531/WG033501)'' :[[SerComm]] (490YY500B-1.6MM / YYNOONOB-1.0) • B0077EYF8A :;Access Points *[[WatchGuard AP100]] (Senao CAP2100AG) :[[Adtran Bluesocket BSAP-1925]] • [[Senao CAP4200AG]] *[[WatchGuard AP220]] (AP120, AP320, AP322, AP420) *[[WatchGuard C-100]] • [[Mojo Networks C-100]]
